text: Jason Gwynne is a journalist, most widely known for his 2004 documentary on the British National Party (BNP). The documentary was based on undercover footage gathered by Gwynne who posed as a football hooligan looking to get involved in far-right politics. ==External links== *BBC News: Going undercover in the BNP Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:British male journalists Category:British National Party people
title: Jason Gwynne
